tit.e: Fuchu (provincial cities which consist of local governments as the core of the city)
tit.cmt: カッコ部分を補いました。
tit.e: Fuchu (provincial cities which consist of local governments as the core of the city)

sen.j: 府中（ふちゅう）とは、令制国の地方官庁（国衙）を中心として成立した都市域である国府の別称。
sen.e: Fuchu is another name of kokufu, an urban area in the ryoseikoku (province) established around its local government office (kokuga).
Fuchu is another name for kokufu, an urban area established around its local government office (kokuga) in the ryoseikoku (province).
sen.cmt: of →for と修正しました。オーダーを修正しました。
sen.e: Fuchu is another name for kokufu, an urban area established around its local government office (kokuga) in the ryoseikoku (province).

sen.j: ただし、府中の中には、守護所（鎌倉時代・室町時代の守護または守護代が統治の本拠とした場所）が置かれたことに由来するものもある。
sen.e: However, some of Fuchu are derived from the fact that they were the sites of shugosho (the site for provincial administration during the Kamakura and Muromachi Period).
However, some of Fuchu are derived from the fact that they were where those shugosho (the site for provincial administration during the Kamakura and Muromachi Period) were located.
sen.cmt: 文脈より修正しました。
sen.e: However, some of Fuchu are derived from the fact that they were where those shugosho (the site for provincial administration during the Kamakura and Muromachi Period) were located.

sen.j: 府内と同義。
sen.e: It is the same meaning of 'Funai.'
It is the same meaning of 'Funai.'
It is the same meaning of 'Funai.'

sen.j: 国府・守護所に由来する府中地名は、北海道と沖縄を除く日本各地に存在している。
sen.e: The place-names of Fuchu which are derived from Kokufu or shugosho can be seen everywhere in Japan except Hokkaido or Okinawa.
The place-names of Fuchu, which are derived from Kokufu or shugosho exist everywhere in Japan, except Hokkaido or Okinawa.
sen.cmt: カンマを補いました。can be seen→exist と修正しました。
sen.e: The place-names of Fuchu, which are derived from Kokufu or shugosho exist everywhere in Japan, except Hokkaido or Okinawa.

sen.j: 代表的な「府中」は、以下のとおり。
sen.e: The representative examples of 'Fuchu' are as follows.
The representative 'Fuchu' are as follows.
sen.cmt: examples of を削除しました。
sen.e: The representative 'Fuchu' are as follows.

sen.j: 越後国府中（新潟県上越市）。
sen.e: Fuchu, Echigo Province (Joetsu City, Nigata Province)
Fuchu, Echigo Province (Joetsu City, Niigata Prefecture).
sen.cmt: 上のセルに入っていた訳を移動し、余分なセルを削除しました。ピリオドを補いました。
sen.e: Fuchu, Echigo Province (Joetsu City, Niigata Prefecture).

sen.j: 常陸国府中（常府。石岡市の旧称）
sen.e: Fuchu, Hitachi Province (or Jofu for short) (the old name of Ishioka City)
Fuchu, Hitachi Province (or Jofu for short) (the old name of Ishioka City)
Fuchu, Hitachi Province (or Jofu for short) (the old name of Ishioka City)

sen.j: 例：常陸府中藩。
sen.e: An example of this: Hitachifuchu Domain.
Example: Hitachifuchu Domain.
sen.cmt: An example of this→Example と修正しました。
sen.e: Example: Hitachifuchu Domain.

sen.j: 武蔵国府中（東京都府中市 (東京都)）。
sen.e: Fuchu, Musashi Province (Fuchu City, Tokyo Prefecture) (Tokyo Prefecture)/
Fuchu, Musashi Province (Fuchu City, Tokyo Metropolis [Tokyo Metropolis]).
sen.cmt: カッコを一つにしました。Prefecture→Metropolis,スラッシュをピリオドに修正しました。
sen.e: Fuchu, Musashi Province (Fuchu City, Tokyo Metropolis [Tokyo Metropolis]).

sen.j: 駿河国府中（駿府。静岡市の旧称）
sen.e: Fuchu, Suruga Province (or Sunpu for short) (the old name of Shizuoka City)
Fuchu, Suruga Province (or Sunpu for short) (the old name of Shizuoka City)
Fuchu, Suruga Province (or Sunpu for short) (the old name of Shizuoka City)

sen.j: 例：府中宿（東海道）。
sen.e: An example of this: Fuchu-shuku station (Tokai-do Road)
Example: Fuchu-shuku station (Tokai-do Road).
sen.cmt: An example of this→Example と修正しました。ピリオドを修正しました。
sen.e: Example: Fuchu-shuku station (Tokai-do Road).

sen.j: 信濃国府中（信府。松本市の旧称）
sen.e: Fuchu, Shinano Province (or Shinpu for short) (the old name of Matsumoto City)
Fuchu, Shinano Province (or Shinpu for short) (the old name of Matsumoto City)
Fuchu, Shinano Province (or Shinpu for short) (the old name of Matsumoto City)

sen.j: 例：信府統記（松本藩正史）
sen.e: An example of this: Shinpu toki (a book about the history, the tradition and the geological history of Matsumoto region in Shinpu) (official history of Matsumoto Domain)
Example: Shinpu toki (a book about the history, the tradition and the geological history of Matsumoto region in Shinpu) (official history of Matsumoto Domain)
sen.cmt: An example of this→Example と修正しました。
sen.e: Example: Shinpu toki (a book about the history, the tradition and the geological history of Matsumoto region in Shinpu) (official history of Matsumoto Domain)

sen.j: 甲斐国府中（甲府市。)
sen.e: Fuchu, Kai Province (Kofu City, Kofu is an abbreviation of 'Kai Fuchu')
Fuchu, Kai Province (Kofu City)
sen.cmt: Kofu is an abbreviation of 'Kai Fuchu' の部分を削除しました。（使用指示書、”「新たな情報の追加」を避け原文にある情報にとどめる”に従い）
sen.e: Fuchu, Kai Province (Kofu City)

sen.j: 甲府は国府所在地ではなく、守護大名の館が置かれた事に由来する。
sen.e: Kofu is derived from the fact that it was the site of the castle of shugo daimyo (daimyo originally assigned as a provincial governor), not the fact that it was the seat of kokufu.
Kofu is derived from the fact that it was the site of the residence of shugo daimyo (daimyo originally assigned as a provincial governor), not the fact that it was where the kokufu was located.
sen.cmt: castle→residence,スペースを修正しました。文後半を文脈より修正しました。
sen.e: Kofu is derived from the fact that it was the site of the residence of shugo daimyo (daimyo originally assigned as a provincial governor), not the fact that it was where the kokufu was located.

sen.j: 正式な甲斐国府の所在地は笛吹市域に推定されている。
sen.e: The seat of Kai Province kokufu as an official one is presumed to have been within Fuefuki City.
The official location of the Kai Province kokufu is presumed to have been within Fuefuki City.
sen.cmt: 文脈より修正しました。
sen.e: The official location of the Kai Province kokufu is presumed to have been within Fuefuki City.

sen.j: 和泉府中（大阪府和泉市。）
sen.e: Izumi Fuchu (Izumi City, Osaka Prefecture)
Izumi Fuchu (Izumi City, Osaka Prefecture)
Izumi Fuchu (Izumi City, Osaka Prefecture)

sen.j: ただし、その範囲は隣接する泉大津市の一部地域に及ぶ。
sen.e: However, it extended to some parts of neighboring Izumiotsu city.
However, it extended to some parts of neighboring Izumiotsu City.
However, it extended to some parts of neighboring Izumiotsu City.

sen.j: 備後国府中（広島県府中市 (広島県)）。
sen.e: Fuchu, Bingo Province (Fuchu City, Hiroshima Prefecture [Hiroshima Prefecture])
Fuchu, Bingo Province (Fuchu City, Hiroshima Prefecture [Hiroshima Prefecture]).
sen.cmt: ピリオドを補いました。
sen.e: Fuchu, Bingo Province (Fuchu City, Hiroshima Prefecture [Hiroshima Prefecture]).

sen.j: 安芸国府中（広島県安芸郡 (広島県)府中町）。
sen.e: Fuchu, Aki Province (Fuchu-cho, Aki District, Hiroshima Prefecture [Hiroshima Prefecture]).
Fuchu, Aki Province (Fuchu-cho, Aki-gun, Hiroshima Prefecture [Hiroshima Prefecture]).
sen.cmt: Aki District→Aki-gun と修正しました。
sen.e: Fuchu, Aki Province (Fuchu-cho, Aki-gun, Hiroshima Prefecture [Hiroshima Prefecture]).

sen.j: 周防国府中（防府市）
sen.e: Fuchu, Suo Province (Hofu City)
Fuchu, Suo Province (Hofu City)
Fuchu, Suo Province (Hofu City)

sen.j: 長門国府中（長府。下関市郊外）。
sen.e: Fuchu, Nagato Province (Chofu for short, a suburb of Shimomoseki City)
Fuchu, Nagato Province (Chofu for short, a suburb of Shimomoseki City).
sen.cmt: ピリオドを補いました。
sen.e: Fuchu, Nagato Province (Chofu for short, a suburb of Shimomoseki City).

sen.j: 対馬国府中（厳原町の旧称）例：対馬府中藩。
sen.e: Fuchu, Tsushima Province (an old name of Izuhara-machi), example: Tsushima Fuchu Domain
Fuchu, Tsushima Province (an old name of Izuhara-machi), example: Tsushima Fuchu Domain.
sen.cmt: ピリオドを補いました。
sen.e: Fuchu, Tsushima Province (an old name of Izuhara-machi), example: Tsushima Fuchu Domain.
